MRH Trowe belongs to one of the largest
owner-managed industrial insurance brokers in Germany.

We advise our clients on all aspects

We are one of the fastest growing companies in our industry.
We follow a clear buy and build strategy.
This means that we want the newly added companies
to be quickly and efficiently
integrated both culturally and operationally.
But above all, of course technically and procedurally.
And that is why working with
AWS has added a lot of value for us.
AWS gives us the flexibility, the resources
and capacities for the exact hour of the day,
to be provided or switched off at precisely the time,
when we need or do not need them.
In the past, for our virtual desktop
we used to provision everything cleanly 24/7.
Today we just make all servers
available to our 700 employees during core working hours.
When we do not need this at night,
weekend, holidays, this is reduced to a server and so we are able to

cost effectively run our data center
with a pay-per-use model from AWS.
The core challenge was, through our explosive growth,
when will our employees see
the egg timer? That is, when will it slow down for my employees?
Then we looked at the issue and did
some research, we have talked to different people and
that as a company we needed to get into the cloud.
that as a company we needed to get into the cloud.
By using the AWS Cloud, we have
freed ourselves from issues such as hardware procurement,
backup management, and performance management.
That gives us a lot more time as a team to take care of the
important and relevant topics of digitization in our environment.
With AWS, with AllCloud,

with great consulting we were
able to complete the project within nine or
ten months, across the finish line.
And I can only advise everyone
to have the courage, move to cloud.
